aboutMe: Hey, my name is Ashwin. I am currently a Senior at Mountain View Highschool in California. I started coding in my sophmore year of highschool, where I learned languages like Java, C, & Python. From there I branched out on my own & learning web based languages such as HTML, CSS, & Javascript, as well as frameworks such as React.
aboutMore: My hobbies include swimming & athletics in general, programming websites & desktop applications, & reading Calvin and Hobbes

activities.message: I have been a part of the school Varsity Swim Team for every year of High School & am the Varisty Captain this upcoming season. I also swim year-round for LAMVAC, a local competitive swim club
My swim career has caused me to pursue being a lifeguard & am CPR & First-Aid certified
I particapate in many clubs throughout my school, includuing Spartan Buddies which I have been apart of for the past 4 years

rightNow.message: Senior year has begun, which means college apps. My class-load this year includes: Advanced CS, Photography I, Philosophy in Literature, AP Physics C Mechanics, AP Statistics, & AP Government

rightNow.title: School Wide Projects
rightNow.message: I am currently leading a team that is working on a project that will better my school known as MV Xperience as well as working with MVHS Ambassadors to build an app that will help incoming freshmen

rightNow.title: MVHacks 4.5
rightNow.message: MVHacks 4.5 is a beginer orientated hackathon, for which I am the Event Director. As the Event Director I am in charge of the logistics & execution of the event

rightNow.title: Personal Projects
rightNow.message: As of right now I am working on projects that will help improve my progamming skills. I want to get more practice with TypeScript, Gatsby, MongoDB, CSS as well as learn Next.js
